1370: Heillam moved to Die Camp.D.2 after marriage.
Got married to Mabelie at age 25 in 1370.
1371: Had a son with Mabelie, Stemaers, at age 26.
1373: Had a son with Mabelie, Rodolf, at age 28.
1375: Had a son with Mabelie, Ricout, at age 30.
1378: Had a daughter with Mabelie, Walburgis, at age 33.
1380: Had a son with Mabelie, Bartrarde, at age 35.
1382: Lost son Bartrarde when Bartrarde was 3 years old.
1386: Had a daughter with Mabelie, Ghoudekinen, at age 41.
1389: Lost his wife Mabelie while she was giving birth to Piak in 1389.
